text: City Heat is a 1984 American action comedy movie directed by Richard Benjamin and starring Clint Eastwood, Burt Reynolds, Jane Alexander, Madeline Kanh, Rip Torn, Irene Cara, Richard Roundtree, Robert Davi. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * Category:1984 action movies Category:1984 comedy movies Category:American action movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Benjamin
title: City Heat
